name: Cannot update the boolean of the param of "public" of project with strange values -- @1.1

steps.name: Given I set up a "PUT" request to "/projects/{proj_id}" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I verify the general_problem of error is: "'public' must be a non-string boolean true or false value"

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional Test Negative Cases of Update Projects
